claim: 1 be the highest number of pole
resp:

To properly compare the poles between these teams, we will focus on the number of poles for each team within a single series per year.
3. We then iterate through each row to find the maximum number of poles obtained by a team in a single series.
4. Upon inspecting the rows, we notice that only one team, Cesário Fórmula, has secured more than one pole position in a single series across different years (2009 Formula 3 Sudamericana and 2011 Formula 3 Brazil Open).
5. Within the same year, 2009, Cesário Fórmula achieved the maximum number of poles (1) in the Formula 3 Sudamericana series.
6. In subsequent years (2010-2011), Cesário Fórmula also secured multiple pole positions but not more than one per year or series.
7. Therefore, the highest number of poles is indeed 1, achieved by Cesário Fórmula in 2009 Formula 3 Sudamericana.

Final answer:
{
  "chain_of_thought": ["Compare the number of pole positions for each team across all seasons.\n1. Focus on the number of poles for each team within a single series per year to account for multiple teams from the same season competing in different series.\n2. The highest number of poles is 1, achieved by Cesário Fórmula in 2009 Formula 3 Sudamericana."],
  "answer": "TRUE",
  "relevant_cells": [
